titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Reverend Alden W. Quimby was pastor of the Berwyn Methodist Episcopal Church in Berwyn, Pennsylvania. He was the author of various works on astronomy as well as works of fiction, such as Valley Forge: A Tale.

scopecontent.p: This collection contains the personal and professional papers of Alden W. Quimby. The collection largely consists of typed manuscripts of stories and articles Quimby contributed to various magazines and journals. Also included are clippings of reviews, correspondence, a batch of marriage licenses, and a small number of photographs and lantern slides.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
